attributes.action: Hold a referendum for all major decisions the government want to take.
attributes.additional_details: To remember that they serve us. The British people. If they want to make a major lifestyle change then it must goto a public vote. Its our lives and no one parry agenda should take proliority over us. The British taxpayer.
attributes.background: To hold a referendum for all major decisions that the government take that effects all British citizens unless it is in their manifesto. ID cards as an example. No one party should hold this much power over the British People

rejection.details:
We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do as major decisions can be subjective. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

You may also be interested in the following petition, which calls for similar action: 

Hold a referendum on introducing mandatory identity cards in the UK
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/734246
